data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Ash Sharqiyah with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ash Sharqiyah, Saudi Arabia

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Ash Sharqiyah, Saudi Arabia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Ash Sharqiyah, Saudi Arabia.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Ash Sharqiyah, Saudi Arabia by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Arab, Saudi - Najdi people.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of Ash Sharqiyah against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Ash Sharqiyah. Through your servants plant 684 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Ash Sharqiyah.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.
